## deck col

Set the colour of button <id>. <red>, <blue>, and <green> must be values from 0 to 255.

### Synopsis

Set the colour of button <id>. <red>, <blue>, and <green> must be values from 0 to 255.

```
deck col <id> <red> <blue> <green> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for col
```
